description:
## What it helps you achieve :

As the name might suggest it's an extension that makes it easy to have dice in your game.
1) You can roll a dice manually.
2) Turn on a parameter so that if your dice moves above a speed limit it will roll automatically (you can specify the limit).
3) Turn this other parameter on which does the same thing but checks if the dice is spinning (you can specify the limit).
4) You can have any number of sides to the dice and have anything on those sides doesn't have to be numbers or dots
5) You can add an animation for when it rolls and even customize how long should the dice roll for (i.e. how long should that animation play for)

## How to set it up :

1) Create a sprite object and add all of the individual sides of the dice as individual animations (please add the dice roll animation after or before all of the sides and not in the middle)

2) Each of the animations representing a side should have a number as their name this would represent the value of that side

3) Add the dice behavior to the object and fill the parameters according to your need


## How to use the features : 

1) You can roll the dice manually by using the "Roll" action under the dice group.

2) You can extract your dice roll values using the "Dice Roll Value" expression.

3) You can use the "Edit Properties" action to change the properties of dice through an event.
name: Dice

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Treat objects as a dice and roll it.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Dice

events.name: Checks if the dice is moving fast enough to roll
Checks if the dice is rotating fast enough to roll

parameters.description: The animation that displays the lowest possible value
parameters.name: RollFrom

parameters.description: The animation that displays the higest possible value
parameters.name: RollTo

parameters.description: The animation that plays when the dice is rolling
parameters.name: RollAnimation

parameters.description: How long the roll animation would play (in seconds)
parameters.name: RollTime

parameters.description: Roll automatically if the dice moves
parameters.name: ReactMove

parameters.description: Velocity at which the roll would be triggered (in px/s)
parameters.name: MoveValue

parameters.description: Roll automatically if the dice spins
parameters.name: ReactSpin

parameters.description: Angular velocity at which the roll would be triggered (in degree/s)
parameters.name: SpinValue

parameters.description: How to store the dice roll value
parameters.name: StorageType
